entry.title: Write for Us
entry.summary: We love working with other authors and people experienced with making money, saving money, working from home, remote jobs, side hustles, side gigs and personal finance. Please complete this form if you have something you would like to contribute or if you want to work together. We love reciprocating links, articles, etc. Fees may apply. Don't get overwhelmed here, this is more common sense…
entry.content:
We love working with other authors and people experienced with making money, saving money, working from home, remote jobs, side hustles, side gigs and personal finance.

Please complete this form if you have something you would like to contribute or if you want to work together. We love reciprocating links, articles, etc. Fees may apply.

Content Guidelines

Don't get overwhelmed here, this is more common sense and is easy if you write quality content.

  • Original, not plagiarized, not copied, content in part or full from any other source.
  • Content may be adapted from other forms (presentations, videos, reports, etc.)
  • Titled with headings, primary and secondary keywords (no keyword stuffing)
  • Include heading format (H1, H2, H3 etc.) 
  • Keep your title to ~55 characters or less to make sure it is not truncated. 
  • Word count is between 750 or great unless otherwise stated
  • Include high quality images and or videos. Images or video should be under creative common license and also provide image source where necessary.
  • Use the same target keyword in the alt text of images.
  • Prior to submitting your article check it for spelling or grammar mistakes.
  • By submitting your guest post to us you allow us to own the copyright and we reserve the right to make edits and adjustments as we see fit.
  • Use bullets points, number lists, sub-headlines, and quotes to make the content easy to read.
  • Minimum of 1 internal link
  • Maximum of 1 internal link every 1000 words

Submit your content.

Thank you.

entry.title: About You
entry.summary: We want to know more about you. Tell us what you want to achieve? Do you want to make more more money, save money, start a side hustle or get side gig? What challenges are you experiencing? What would help you achieve these goals? If we can help, we will get back to you with more information and resources. Loading…
entry.content:
We want to know more about you. Tell us what you want to achieve? Do you want to make more more money, save money, start a side hustle or get side gig? What challenges are you experiencing? What would help you achieve these goals?

If we can help, we will get back to you with more information and resources.

entry.title: More About Us
entry.summary: We've been working online since 2002. We begun doing technical support and design services for an early ecommerce platform. Our first full-time work from home gig started in 2011 and we've been doing this ever since. We now manage five brands with a few dozen contractors. We've always thought we should chronicle our lives and experience working from home. We've had challenges, fun times,…
entry.content:
We've been working online since 2002. We begun doing technical support and design services for an early ecommerce platform. Our first full-time work from home gig started in 2011 and we've been doing this ever since. We now manage five brands with a few dozen contractors.

We've always thought we should chronicle our lives and experience working from home. We've had challenges, fun times, and love the puns all along the way.

Follow us and we'll introduce you to how you can work from home on your own side hustle, time gig working for someone else, and save money too.

entry.title: Terms, Conditions, Privacy, etc.
entry.summary: Terms of Service Our service is provided as-is with no warranty. We will do our best to provide you great information and tools and keep them available as much as possible. We reserve the right to limit access to our resources at our sole discretion.  We reserve the right to use the content, data and tools at our disposal for our advantage as long…
entry.content:
Terms of Service

Our service is provided as-is with no warranty.

Conditions

We will do our best to provide you great information and tools and keep them available as much as possible. We reserve the right to limit access to our resources at our sole discretion. 

Privacy

We reserve the right to use the content, data and tools at our disposal for our advantage as long as it is good and legal.

Disclosure

The content on HomeOfficePolitics.com may contain affiliate links, meaning we receive payment if you decide to make a purchase or sign up through our links, at no cost to you. Please use our links to help support everything we are trying to do for you and our community.
